## Tuple.GetInner type

**Signature:**

```typescript
type GetInner<T extends Tuple, I extends number, S extends Tuple> = T extends readonly [infer H, ...infer R] ? I extends Size<S> ? H : GetInner<R, I, Append<S, H>> : never;
```
